io.dropwizard.jersey.params

Class IntParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.jersey.params.AbstractParam<Integer>
      • io.dropwizard.jersey.params.IntParam

  • public class IntParam
extends AbstractParam<Integer>
    A parameter encapsulating integer values. All non-decimal values will return a 400 Bad Request response.

    • Constructor Summary

      Given a string representation which was unable to be parsed and the exception thrown, produce an entity to be sent to the client.

      Given a string representation, parse it and return an instance of the parameter type.
